comment: Tonight's ERG meeting saw a healthy turnout of new members , outnumbering old hands . I'm advised to expect more next time . We are proud to support as we deliver our manifesto to <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Tonight's ERG meeting saw a healthy turnout of new members , outnumbering old hands . I'm advised to expect more next time . We are proud to support as we deliver our manifesto to <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / see-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / meet-03
                  :ARG0 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "ERG"))
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :dayperiod (n2 / night)
                        :mod (t / today)))
            :ARG1 (t2 / turn-out-17
                  :ARG1 (m3 / member
                        :ARG1-of (n3 / new-01))
                  :mod (h / healthy)
                  :ARG1-of (o2 / outnumber-01
                        :ARG2 (h2 / hand
                              :mod (o3 / old)))))
      :snt2 (a / advise-01
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (e / expect-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (m4 / more)
                  :time (t3 / time
                        :mod (n4 / next))))
      :snt3 (p / pride-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG2 (s2 / support-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :time (d2 / deliver-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (m5 / manifesto
                              :poss w)
                        :ARG2 (u / url-entity)))))
